entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southeast 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
